c74object.name: mb.classicsynth~
c74object.digest: A synth the emulates the classic moog sound using a ladder filter

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event

method.name: ratio
method.digest: A multiple of the base frequency the resonant filter will slide to

method.name: q
method.digest: The resonance of the filter from 0-1

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
